job_title: Java Fullstack Developer With Angular 13+ Version
jd: Hi, Hope you are doing well!! I have an urgent requirement with one of my client. Please find the job details below and forward me your updated resume along with your contact details at Pavankumar.v@itechus.net or Call Me at 802-778-1770 Position – Java Fullstack Developer With Angular 13+ Version Duration – Longterm ContractLocation – Woodland Hills, CA || Culver City, CA – Hybrid – Need locals from CA Need only H1B and Need locals from CA with DL/State ID from CA Essential Skills: Should have 10+ years of experienceExperience on Advanced Java Concepts, Spring Boot, Angular 13+Minimum 8 years of experience in JDK 1.8 , Springs3.x, Hibernate 4.0, JPA 2.0Experience in working with Version Control Tools like Github, etc.Good knowledge of Spring boot and Angular 8.0/8+,jQuery,Ajax,BootstrapStrong experience working in Agile frameworkGood knowledge of Microservices based architecture.Strong Experience working on large volume databases, PLSQL, Stored Procedure.Working knowledge of JMS and JBoss Messaging, Active MQ.Deep expertise in Object Oriented analysis and design, UML modeling, Classic design patterns andJ2EE patterns.Experience with Eclipse, XML, SOAP/REST WebServices.Hands On Experience in CICD tools like Jenkins, Liquibase, etcExperience working in complex projects with multi-tier architecture.Manage team metrics and work with the Jira administration team to define any customizations needed in support of those metrics.
